h2.div: April 17: School Closured Remainder Of Year

font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

div.span: ADM Students, Parents, Staff and Community,

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;
click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

span.style: top: -11px
font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

div.span: It is with great sadness that I report today that Governor Kim Reynolds determined that it is in the public health interest of the state for Iowa schools to remain closed through the end of the year. ADM Schools will follow this order and we have been proactively planning for this possibility over the past several weeks. I recognize the significant impact that this closure has on students, parents, staff and our ADM community and the numerous questions that come with a closure of this magnitude.

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;
click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

span.style: top: -11px
font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;
span.a: Please take time to read my full letter

span.style: font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

div.span: , which provides important information that we can provide today, with many more details to come in the days ahead.

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;
click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

span.style: top: -11px
font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

div.span: In the midst of these difficult times, we remain committed to our mission of engaging ALL students in a challenging and supportive environment that ensures ALL students learn at high levels. I am reminded daily of the quality and character of the ADM community, students, parents, and staff and I have never been more proud to be an ADM Tiger!

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

h2.div: April 7: Data, Internet, and Video Conferencing Update

font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

div.span: Parents and Families,

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;

span.style: top: -11px
font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

div.span: Please take a moment to read the following information about data, wifi, internet connected devices, and video conferencing related to the Voluntary Educational Review and New Learning Opportunities taking place at ADM during the current school closure.

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: center; text-indent: 0;

div.span: Please Read:

span.a: Internet, Devices, and Video Conferencing Update

span.style: top: -11px
font-family: Lato; font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

div.span: ADM Staff and Parents -

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;
click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

span.style: top: -11px
font-family: Lato; font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

div.span: Today Governor Kim Reynolds determined that it is in the public health interest of the state for Iowa schools to remain closed through April 30, 2020. ADM Schools will follow this recommendation. I recognize the significant impact that a school closure of this extent has on students, parents, staff and our ADM community.

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;

span.style: top: -11px
font-family: Lato; font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

div.span: ADM began providing “voluntary educational opportunities” on Monday, March 23 through the

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Lato; font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

div.span: . As

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Lato; font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

div.span: , ADM will provide parents and students with more structured voluntary educational review and new learning opportunities starting Monday, April 6th.

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;
click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

span.style: top: -11px
font-family: Lato; font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

div.span: In light of the extended closure announced today, ADM will continue to explore and evaluate guidance related to implementing “required educational services”. There are a variety of challenges that make it difficult for ADM to pursue “required” services at this time but it is something that will be evaluated using guidance from the Iowa Department of Education.

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;
click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

span.style: top: -11px
font-family: Lato; font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

div.span: Finally, I recognize that this extended closure produces continued uncertainty and questions on a variety of topics. Please refer to the

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Lato; font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

div.span: for the most up-to-date information and answers to common questions. We will continue with direct communication to parents and staff as questions are answered and decisions are made. Thank you for your grace, patience, and strength during this difficult time.

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

div.span: Sincerely,

span.strong: How is ADM Providing The Free Sack Lunch Program?

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;

span.style: top: -11px
font-family: Lato; font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

div.span: Due to the COVID-19 school closures, ADM applied for waivers to provide free meals to children 18 years and younger in the communities of Adel, DeSoto, and Minburn. Initially, ADM was only approved to provide meals at Adel Elementary and the ADM Middle/High School Campus. After continuing to work with state agencies, ADM has now been approved to provide meals at locations in Minburn and DeSoto.

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;

span.style: top: -11px
font-family: Lato; font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

div.span: The ADM Community School District thanks the Good Samaritan Food Pantry for their partnership in providing free sack lunches in DeSoto and Minburn while additional waivers were being obtained from the state. ADM encourages community members to consider supporting the Good Samaritan Food pantry during this time. More information can be found at their website:

span.strong: Why is ADM not currently providing required instructional packets or digital lessons during this closure?

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;
margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.span: ADM is following guidelines from the Iowa Department of education that states, “Public districts may not require any students to participate in online educational programming or any other services while school is closed.” -

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;
span.a: View Iowa Department of Education Guidance

font-family: Lato; font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

div.span: As a result of this guidance, all PK-12 learning, including special education services, has been suspended at ADM while schools are closed.

div.span: I hope you all are doing well. I know this spring break has certainly been different due to the COVID-19 crisis, and there continues to be much uncertainty at this time. If you have been traveling or out of communication over the past week, I would encourage you to take a moment to visit

div.span: PK-12 learning, including special education services, have been suspended while schools are closed. ADM will not be providing distance learning and instruction during this time. We do anticipate launching an ADM Learning Resources website which will provide parents and students with optional resources that could be used during the current school closure due to COVID-19. Students will not be required to use the resources and information found on the site. Please look for information about this website early next week. Please use the following link for more information about why ADM is not providing distance learning and instruction:

div.span: Due to the COVID-19 school closures, ADM applied for waivers to provide free meals to children 18 years and younger in the communities of Adel, DeSoto, and Minburn. At this time ADM has been approved to provide meals at Adel Elementary and the ADM Middle/High School Campus, however, waivers to provide food at locations in Minburn and DeSoto were denied.

div.span: Due to the waivers being denied for the communities of DeSoto and Minburn, ADM has partnered with the Good Samaritan Food Pantry to help provide free sack lunches to children 18 years or under in these communities. ADM encourages community members to consider supporting the Good Samaritan Food pantry during this time. More information can be found at their website:

div.span: Thank you for your patience and understanding as we continue to work through a variety of issues related to the current school closure. We recognize that a school closure has a significant impact on the daily lives of so many in our community. The purpose of the communication is to provide an update about access to food for children in our community. If you are in need or will be in need of food, please utilize the following resources. If you do not need these resources at this time, please help by sharing this information with others in our community.

h3.div: As communicated by Superintendent Dufoe, ADM will be closed until April 13th due to the COVID-19 health situation. Please view the letter below for more information about the current closure.

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.a: 3/16/20 Parent Letter From ADM Superintendent Greg Dufoe

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;

span.style: top: -11px
font-family: Lato; font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

div.span: Additionally, a

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;
span.a: FAQ page has been added to ADM’s COVID-19 website

span.style: font-family: Lato; font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

div.span: . The FAQ will address common questions and will be updated as new information is gathered and decisions are made.

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;
click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

span.style: top: -11px
font-family: Lato; font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

div.span: Tonight Governor Reynolds recommended all Iowa schools close until April 13, 2020 due to COVID-19. We will be following that recommendation at ADM. In the short term that means our schools are inaccessible except for designated staff. All athletic practices, school activities and outside group use of district facilities are canceled immediately.

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;
click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

span.style: top: -11px
font-family: Lato; font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

div.span: The Governor plans to provide more information tomorrow and we will communicate with you once we know next steps. We are working through all options for our staff, students, and families and will have more information as soon as possible. We appreciate your patience.

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;
click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

span.style: top: -11px
font-family: Lato; font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

div.span: Please follow all recommended practices to keep yourselves and others healthy. No doubt these are difficult times. However, I am confident we will work together to meet this challenge.

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;

span.style: top: -11px
font-family: Lato; font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

div.span: Sincerely,

div.span: Greg Dufoe

div.span: ADM Superintendent

h2.div: March 13: Update and Central Iowa Schools - Joint Message

div.jsaction: click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue;touchstart:p6p2H; touchmove:FwuNnf; touchend:yfqBxc(preventMouseEvents=true|preventDefault=true); touchcancel:JMtRjd;focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue;touchstart:p6p2H; touchmove:FwuNnf; touchend:yfqBxc(preventMouseEvents=true|preventDefault=true); touchcancel:JMtRjd;focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;
click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

span.style: top: -11px
font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

div.span: In light of recent university and public school closures, central Iowa school district leaders met Friday, March 13, to collaborate and discuss our response to the current COVID-19 health situation. Representatives from the Governor’s Office and other educational agencies were also present.

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;
click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

span.style: top: -11px
font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

div.span: Following current guidance, ADM will resume school as planned after spring break on March 23, 2020. Please see the attached document for the full joint statement from area metro schools about COVID-19 and school closures.

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;
click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

span.style: top: -11px
font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;
span.a: Joint Statement From Area Metro Schools about COVID-19

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;
click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

span.style: top: -11px
font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

div.span: We will continue to be in close contact with Dallas County Public Health and the Iowa Department of Public Health (IDPH) and will follow the guidelines and recommendations from those entities.

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;

h3.div: Additionally, to help organize ADM's communications, we have launched this website that will house all past and future ADM updates. ADM will continue to communicate directly to staff and parents via email but hope this site can be a helpful reference to view all ADM produced COVID-19 information in one location.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-R6PoUb purZT-AhqUyc-R6PoUb pSzOP-AhqUyc-R6PoUb jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;

h2.div: March 12: Spring Break Travel - Cruise Ships

div.jsaction: click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue;touchstart:p6p2H; touchmove:FwuNnf; touchend:yfqBxc(preventMouseEvents=true|preventDefault=true); touchcancel:JMtRjd;focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue;touchstart:p6p2H; touchmove:FwuNnf; touchend:yfqBxc(preventMouseEvents=true|preventDefault=true); touchcancel:JMtRjd;focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;
click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

span.style: top: -11px
font-family: Lato; font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

div.span: At this time the U.S. Department of State is recommending against cruise ship travel. Those traveling by cruise ship may be impacted by travel restrictions affecting their itineraries or ability to disembark or may be subject to quarantine procedures implemented by the local authorities.

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;
click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

span.style: top: -11px
font-family: Lato; font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

div.span: The CDC is recommending that individuals that travel by cruise ship over spring break monitor their health and limit interactions with others for 14 days after returning to the United States. ADM is waiting for further clarification on the guidance of limiting interaction and the impact of student or staff attendance at school.

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;
click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

span.style: top: -11px
font-family: Lato; font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

div.span: Furthermore, If a case of COVID-19 is reported on the ship during the cruise, ADM will encourage staff and students to follow the public health recommendation of staying home during the 14 days after returning and practicing social distancing.

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;

h3.div: If families travel by cruise ship, or plan to, they should notify their school nurse to make arrangements prior to reentry to school.

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

h2.div: March 10: Spring Break Travel - High Risk Countries

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;

h3.div: At this time there are five countries around the world that have been identified by the CDC as being "high-risk" for the spread of the coronavirus: China, Iran, Italy, Japan, and South Korea. The Iowa Department of Public Health recommends that anyone who visits those countries voluntarily self-isolates for 14 days upon their return.

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;
click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

span.style: top: -11px
font-family: Lato; font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

div.span: ADM encourages any family or student who visits somewhere the CDC has identified as a high risk for Coronavirus to follow the public health recommendations of voluntary self-isolation upon their return. If families travel to these areas, or plan to, they should notify their school nurse to make arrangements for the student’s reentry to school.

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

div.span: At this time, there are no reported cases in Iowa and the vast majority of Americans have a low risk of exposure.

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;
click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

span.style: top: -11px
font-family: Lato; font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

div.span: However, given recent announcements by the U.S. Centers for Disease Control that Coronavirus may spread – and that cases of influenza are regularly reported – we wanted to share some additional information about steps that ADM is taking as well as steps you can take to help prevent the spread of viruses. Thank you for your support and partnership as we work together to maintain a healthy learning environment.

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;

span.style: top: -11px

div.span: ADM is in regular contact with the Dallas County Public Health and the Iowa Department of Public Health (IDPH), and following guidelines and best practices from those entities.

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;
click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

span.style: top: -11px
font-family: Lato; font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

div.span: In recent weeks ADM has reviewed our cleaning and disinfecting practices at schools to help prevent the spread of viruses and have recently increased our cleaning and safety supplies.

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;
click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

span.style: top: -11px
font-family: Lato; font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

div.span: ADM will continue to monitor the situation with county and state health officials. Should Iowa’s status change, the district will turn to the IDPH and the CDC and follow any updated guidelines.

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;

div.span: Review good hygiene with your family to help keep them safe. Examples of some everyday preventive actions to lessen the spread of viruses include:

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;
click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

span.style: top: -11px
font-family: Lato; font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

div.span: If a student or staff member is sick, do not come to school.

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;
click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

span.style: top: -11px
font-family: Lato; font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

div.span: Cover your mouth with your upper arm or a tissue when coughing or sneezing.

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;
click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

span.style: top: -11px
font-family: Lato; font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

div.span: Wash your hands often with soap and water for at least 20 seconds. Use an alcohol-based hand sanitizer that contains at least 60% alcohol if soap and water are not available.

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;
click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

span.style: top: -11px
font-family: Lato; font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

div.span: Avoid touching your eyes, nose, and mouth with unwashed hands.

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;
click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

span.style: top: -11px
font-family: Lato; font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

div.span: Avoid close contact with people who are sick.

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;

span.style: top: -11px
font-family: Lato; font-size: 20px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

div.span: Clean and disinfect frequently touched objects and surfaces.
